case.title: Looking for a Prince! - 20 (London)
case.text:
I am a 20 year old girl looking for someone who will take care of me and show me all the nice places that London has to offer. Preferably you are an professional guy that is either just cultivated or well-educated. You need to have a good heart and be financially stable. I am willing to travel as well since I work as a private tutor. I am fun!
Only serious answers, please.
Mila
